item.title: Big Data Bowl - Identifying Difficult Passes with Deep Learning
item.description: Graduate deep learning project, using a convolutional neural network to predict NFL completion percentages at the time of throw.

item.title: Quantifying the Loss of Rapid Transit on Chicago's South Side
item.description: Graduate spatial data science project on the history of public transit in the South Side.

item.title: Fantasy Baseball Roto Draft Optimization
item.description: Using integer programming to select an optimal fantasy baseball roster.

item.title: MLB Umpire Discrimination Research
item.description: Award-winning undergraduate econometrics thesis on umpire discrimination.
